response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value for us at $1,000,000. Considering its worth and potential impact on your endeavors, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this exceptional product at a special price of $950,000. This offer is designed to ensure you benefit from its full capabilities while also making it accessible within your financial considerations. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we can finalize the details promptly.", "product_price": 950000}
